categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic organizations

nodes.text: The Wideband Temp Agency was a front company for the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. It was based in the city of Dearic, on the planet Talus.

The Wideband Temp Agency was as a front company for Rebel recruiters on Talus by the time following the Battle of Yavin. It was located in a building in Dearic that served as the office of Captain Vayde Quellium. Circa 1 ABY, Trezya Nenei, a representative of the anti-Imperial movement known as the Aggregate Civil Liberties Organization, visited the office in order to negotiate the integration of the A.C.L.O. in the Rebel Alliance. In the meantime, CorSec officer Dathnaeya Loessin sent a spacer to the office to work with Captain Quellium because she wanted to learn more about the ideologies and practices of the Empire and the Rebellion.

The Wideband Temp Agency appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Wideband Temp Agency was added to the game as part of the "Crisis of Allegiance" arc with the release of "Chapter 2: The Talus Incident", on August 1, 2006.
